rows.label: qst201604_msg0001
rows.name:
Oho, friend Nanakoori!
Thank you for coming,
everything now taken care of!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0002
rows.name:
So, so, first please come here
and sign contract document.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0003
rows.name:
Is there any chance we
are being deceived...?

rows.label: qst201604_msg0004
rows.name:
Hana also find this shady.
Something not smell right.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0005
rows.name:
It'll be fine, don't worry so
much! Look, it took Nanakoori a
while to get into this idea...

rows.label: qst201604_msg0006
rows.name:
But now she's got a chance to
share her talent with the world!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0007
rows.name: We should be more supportive.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0008
rows.name:
I guess if there's any problems, we
can deal with them as and when.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0009
rows.name: Very good! Now contract all set!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0010
rows.name:
We can begin with building
foundation of stardom!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0011
rows.name:
Friend Nanakoori, we will pick up
pace, so try to not fall behind, eh?

rows.label: qst201604_msg0012
rows.name: A-absolutely!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0013
rows.name:
First of all, we need voice
that captivate audience...
we need powerful vocal!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0014
rows.name:
Next, we also need powerful
image which draw attention!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0015
rows.name:
And finally, to stay calm on
stage, we need powerful spirit!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0016
rows.name:
Not to worry, Pi teach
friend all about it!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0017
rows.name: Y-yes, sir.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0018
rows.name:
For time being, we say
friend Nanakoori is level
one across all fields.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0019
rows.name: That's harsh...

rows.label: qst201604_msg0020
rows.name:
In case friend Nia curious, Nia have
vocals level minus five, image level
negative two, and soul level five.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0021
rows.name: Watch it!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0022
rows.name:
Me kid, me kid. Anyway, first goal
is raise all areas to level two.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0023
rows.name:
If friend want to know
levels, just talk to Pi.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0024
rows.name: All right! Let lessons begin!
